message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe its unique features and benefits justify a special price of $2000000. We are confident it will exceed your expectations and bring significant value to your endeavors. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
